item.title: Pip bug
item.description: Anyone running Debian testing/unstable, heads up on a breakage in pip that bit me this morning. Now Iâ€™m stuck with versions of ipython that dont work, as the apt package is broken and pip is broken. Since I’m loath to install it manually, rather than through a package manager, I’m out of luck at the moment until the maintainer fixes the package. :( imported from: yetanothergeographer
